top-page.title: Don't Put in Extra Work Making Maintenance Requests
top-page.desc: Easily input a request with our tenant management system, then track its progress. Access your history of resolved requests for maintenance to ensure you receive your deposit back when you move out.

images.title: Easily Communicate with Landlord to Resolve Issues
images.desc: Landlord and tenant communications are notoriously difficult, but Rentorr makes them easier with transparent messaging. Talk through any problems in real time, and receive a prompt response thanks to our property management software notifications.

title-one.title: How Are Rentorr Maintenance Requests Different?

text-start.title: Attach Photos and Videos
text-start.text: Make the status of your issue clear by attaching photos and videos to your maintenance request so your landlord understands the problem at hand.

text-center.title: Acess Request History
text-center.text: You can look through the archive of your resolved maintenance requests at any time to keep your own record of repairs that have been made in your property rentals.

text-end.title: Get Notifications
text-end.text: Rentorr will keep you updated on the status of your maintenance request, and will also send you a notification once your request has been completed.

ready.title: Get Issues Resolved Faster
ready.desc: Putting in a maintenance request doesn't have to be a headache, complete it in seconds using Rentorr.
